title: Getaway Car
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:00.55] No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car
[00:03.25] It was the best of times, the worst of crimes
[00:06.47] I struck a match and blew your mind
[00:08.52] But I didn't mean it, and you didn't see it
[00:14.71] The ties were black, the lies were white
[00:17.41] In shades of gray in candlelight
[00:19.54] I wanted to leave him, I needed a reason
[00:25.96] "X" marks the spot where we fell apart
[00:28.52] He poisoned the well, I was lyin' to myself
[00:31.32] I knew it from the first Old Fashioned, we were cursed
[00:34.24] We never had a shotgun shot in the dark (oh!)
[00:36.71] You were drivin' the getaway car
[00:39.57] We were flyin', but we'd never get far
[00:43.12] Don't pretend it's such a mystery
[00:45.43] Think about the place where you first met me
[00:48.23] Ridin' in a getaway car
[00:50.88] There were sirens in the beat of your heart
[00:54.25] Should've known I'd be the first to leave
[00:56.49] Think about the place where you first met me
[01:00.44] In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh
[01:03.19] No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah
[01:07.38] No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car
[01:10.38] It was the great escape, the prison break
[01:13.39] The light of freedom on my face
[01:15.40] But you weren't thinkin' and I was just drinkin'
[01:21.53] While he was runnin' after us, I was screamin', "Go, go, go!"
[01:25.07] But with three of us, honey, it's a sideshow
[01:27.86] And a circus ain't a love story, and now we're both sorry (we're both sorry)
[01:32.76] "X" marks the spot where we fell apart
[01:35.51] He poisoned the well, every man for himself
[01:38.34] I knew it from the first Old Fashioned, we were cursed
[01:41.22] It hit you like a shotgun shot to the heart (oh!)
[01:43.67] You were drivin' the getaway car
[01:46.41] We were flyin', but we'd never get far
[01:50.05] Don't pretend it's such a mystery
[01:52.58] Think about the place where you first met me
[01:55.13] Ridin' in a getaway car
[01:57.79] There were sirens in the beat of your heart
[02:01.25] Should've known I'd be the first to leave
[02:03.56] Think about the place where you first met me
[02:07.31] In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh
[02:10.28] No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah
[02:14.48] No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car
[02:18.39] We were jet-set, Bonnie and Clyde (oh-oh)
[02:24.12] Until I switched to the other side, to the other side
[02:29.20] It's no surprise I turned you in (oh-oh)
[02:34.63] 'Cause us traitors never win
[02:40.69] I'm in a getaway car
[02:43.16] I left you in a motel bar
[02:45.22] Put the money in a bag and I stole the keys
[02:48.33] That was the last time you ever saw me (oh!)
[02:51.05] Drivin' the getaway car
[02:53.30] We were flyin', but we'd never get far (don't pretend)
[02:57.11] Don't pretend it's such a mystery
[02:59.44] Think about the place where you first met me
[03:02.30] Ridin' in a getaway car
[03:04.74] There were sirens in the beat of your heart (should've known)
[03:08.32] Should've known I'd be the first to leave
[03:10.57] Think about the place where you first met me
[03:14.31] In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh
[03:17.33] No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah
[03:21.32] No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car
[03:24.23] I was ridin' in a getaway car
[03:27.11] I was cryin' in a getaway car
[03:29.84] I was dyin' in a getaway car
[03:32.58] Said goodbye in a getaway car
[03:35.60] Ridin' in a getaway car
[03:38.28] I was cryin' in a getaway car
[03:40.98] I was dyin' in a getaway car
[03:43.65] Said goodbye in a getaway car
[03:47.33]
